data.actual_result: The message turns red and you do not get an error message. This is probably because Discord will interpret your #my-channel mention as <#my-channel-id> making it way longer, longer than 2000 chars. Because of that it won't send.
data.expected_result: The message appears or you get an error message that it did not work
data.short_description: Messages glitch out in the client when using mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a message that has almost or exactly 2000 characters (Character Limit) and include a mention of a channel or user in it. Example: "BlaBla [...] Bla#my-channel" - Send it to any discord channel (Make sure the channel/user exists) - Enjoy the redness
